page.title: 03Newtown
page.content: This Newtown square is a real mixture of housing and schools(a First School,a Middle School,2 Secondary Schools) an Allotment area and a cemetery and not forgetting a playing field (that's where we go for our games lessons in school.)Most schools in the area use these playing fields as most of the schools haven't got any playing field space of their own. Along the main road from Southampton there is a council estate and on the main road a small Precinct of shops. This main road leads out of Southampton to the east and once wasn't very busy but since the new Itchen Bridge was opened (in 1977), going straight into the centre of town, the traffic is very bad in the morning and evening.
